A

AbstractSubPanel - Class in fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.ui.subpanels
This abstract class for SubPanels implements the ActiveGame null checker, in other words, the sub panel will not add content to itself if ActiveGame is null.
AbstractSubPanel(GameLogic) - Constructor for class fi.sewsiaica.uusiaika.ui.subpanels.AbstractSubPanel
The class gets all the information from ActiveGame via GameLogic.

The abstract view panel currently contains the implementation of the getNewButtonPanel method.

Calls the parent constructor with no arguments.
